tool_description: An Api showing all the latest Climate Change News
name: Climate Change Live CMC
title: Climate Change Live CMC

api_list.name: Get Indiviual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets News from a specific News resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-cmc.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-cmc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-cmc.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-cmc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all Climate Change News from all over the world
